title: UK government proposes pilots for Covid-19 passports as way out of lockdown
content:
1. UK government proposes pilots for Covid-19 passports as way out of lockdown  CNN
  2. COVID-19: Dates revealed for UK's first 'vaccine passport' events  Sky News
  3. Libertarians need to shut up about vaccine passports, everything else  The Nevada Independent
  4. Covid: Passports showing vaccine status would be 'time-limited', says minister  BBC News
  5. U.K. Covid Passports May Not Be Ready for Months, Telegraph Says  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 英国政府拟对科维德-19护照进行试点，以此作为摆脱封锁的方法。
